channel.title: Amazon partnership on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon partnership on FinanClub

item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:52 Chances: Plug Power installed electrolyzer capable of powering more than 225 hydrogen fuel cell-powered forklift trucks at Amazon fulfillment center, showing potential for increased adoption of hydrogen technology in the material handling market.New proposed rules from the government could affect the hydrogen industry, creating uncertainty for future hydrogen projects and potential impact on Plug Power’s business.
